CustomField.description: This flag indicates that all manual communications have been completed. Cases with related contacts with 'Notification Required' = true and 'Preferred Method of Contact' = Phone, will not be set to Pending Customer Notification by the system when closed.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This flag indicates that all manual communications have been completed. Cases with related contacts with 'Notification Required' = true and 'Preferred Method of Contact' = Phone, will not be set to Pending Customer Notification by the system when closed.
CustomField.label: All Manual Communications Completed
